markdown:
Marids are capricious but powerful genies from the Plane of Water; among geniekind, they are rivaled in power only by the fiery efreet. Marids embody the strength of the ocean’s waves and currents, but they also have a gentler side, loving performance and art such as dancing, music, and storytelling.
Marids regard efreet with hostility but rarely encounter them in their native environment. They get along with djinn, jann, and shaitans, although the latter consider marids flighty and annoying, associating only long enough to close trade deals. Water in the aura that is also in the same body of water as the marid is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures. Creatures with the water trait are immune. --- **Speed** 20 feet, swim 40 feet **Melee** _trident_ +21 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+11 piercing **Melee** fist +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d4+11 bludgeoning **Ranged** _trident_ +21 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 2d8+11 piercing **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 28 - **2nd** [Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28) (at will), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) - **4th** [Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154) (at will), [Hydraulic Torrent](/Spells.aspx?ID=155), [Solid Fog](/Spells.aspx?ID=290) - **5th** [Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=51) (at will), [Hallucinatory Terrain](/Spells.aspx?ID=145) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (at will; to Astral Plane, Elemental Planes, or Material Plane only) - **Constant (1st)** [Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (evil or good only) - **Constant (5th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The marid can take on the appearance of any water elemental or humanoid. This ability doesn’t change the marid’s Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes. **Rush of Water** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) The marid releases a jet of water in a 60-foot line, dealing 9d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 28 basic Reflex save). A creature that fails its save is also pushed 10 feet (20 feet on a critical failure). The marid can’t use Rush of Water again for 1d4 rounds. **Skewer** The marid makes a trident Strike, dealing an extra 2d6 persistent bleed damage on a hit (4d6 on a critical hit).
Marid Shahzadas Marid shahzadas grant wishes in ways that amuse them. They add the following to their innate spells: **5th** [_cone of cold_ (at will)](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [_illusory creature_ (×2)](/Spells.aspx?ID=158).
